subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant will make his 15th straight All-Star start. The Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony will join the Heat’s LeBron James and Dwyane Wade in the Eastern Conference lineup for the Feb. 17 All-Star Game in Houston.
snippet: Kobe Bryant will make his 15th straight All-Star start. The Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony will join the Heat’s LeBron James and Dwyane Wade in the Eastern Conference lineup for the Feb. 17 All-Star Game in Houston.
